metadata.name: MFERS ARE NEVER LOST
metadata.description:
About mfers (1). It is more than a feeling and there are no rules. Mfers do what they want, and yet it is a strong community. The community lives its own way of a "family". The Mfer way. 

"What if we all had that motherfucker inside of us. we are all degens in our own way, sitting at the computer and finding our way in a new world...artists, collectors, investors, gamers, teachers, whatever. what if a nft collection could capture that feeling so that everyone could be their inner mfer?" --by sartoshi

Somehow all mfer are connected. And somehow there is a great cohesion. and so .... MFERS ARE NEVER LOST
